name: simple-store-js
description: Simple State Management: isomorphic, slim, quick

scripts.release:major: npm run build && git commit -a -m "Increment and release major" && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && git commit -a -m "Increment and release minor" && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && git commit -a -m "Increment and release patch" && npm version patch && npm publish

author: Ryan M. Poe
